comments: Conjecture: a(n) < A216151(n) for all n > 1. - _Jon Perry_, Sep 12 2012a(n) is about x^y^n with y = phi^2 = 2.61803398874... and x around 1.04200817421788490539. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 12 2012
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..11
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[n_] := Product[a[i], {i, n - 1}] Sum[a[i], {i, n - 1}]; Array[a, 10] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 03 2012 *)
prog: (PARI)v=vector(12,n,1);for (n=3,#v, v[n] = prod(k=1,n-1, v[k]) * sum(k=1,n-1, v[k] ) );v057194=v/* _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 03 2012 */(Haskell)a057194 n = a057194_list !! (n-1)a057194_list = 1 : f 1 1 where   f u v = w : f (u * w) (v + w) where w = u * v-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 20 2014
